text_blocks.content: was wondering if she could work tonight - she couldn't work yesterday b/c her mom had to go to hospital

additional_notes: The document contains multiple 'Important Message' forms with some handwritten notes and redactions. The stamp 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 2-O-R' is present on one of the forms.
